vali.name: Váli
vali.title: God of Vengeance
vali.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, with a vindictive personality. Adores her sister Baldr, swearing an oath to exact vengeance on those who have harmed her.

Castle Hall: Where is she? Where is Baldr? When I see her here, I will burn the sight of her into my eyes...
I am thinking about how I will greet Baldr... Do not interrupt me!
I am the god of vengeance. Even if I fall, I will never stop until I have my revenge! Never forget that.
Any loss to Baldr is like a tiny stone under her. She will just grow stronger and more beautiful because of it!
This doll is my favorite weapon, yet... It does not even come close to Baldr's beauty.
Visit: Can you believe someone asked Baldr to pass on a message? I will handle it. It is from [F].
Level: This is expected. I, too, am a god of Ásgarðr, you know.
No! I will not give up yet!
Summon: I am Váli, the strong, wise, beautiful Celestial Sun God Baldr's...little sister!
Learn Skill: With this power, I shall avenge my sister!
Confession:
I have not done anything wrong! I am simply waiting for my sister to come home.
I have no doubt she will be victorious, but...there could be awful mortals out there...
If she falls into someone's trap, then...I...
That coward will feel the wrath of my vengeance! Even if I have to chase them to the ends of the realms!
Then, Baldr will praise me with her kind, beautiful smile. Ahhh...
Status: I am Váli. Of course, you have heard of Baldr, my perfect older sister.
*gasp* You will feel the wrath of my vengeance!
*laugh* You have no hope of standing against Baldr.
I shall avenge you, my sister.
No one can rival Baldr. No one!
*sigh* She is so strong, so wise, so beautiful...
I only do as you say for my sister's sake.

alfador.name: Alfaðör
alfador.title: Celestial King
alfador.description: King of the gods of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. He desires to know everything and will sacrifice whatever it takes to obtain this knowledge.

Castle Hall: These warriors from many different worlds... Might they have any knowledge to impart unto me?

I performed the Rite of Heaven and learned all there is to know about the nine realms...
Yet the writings that depict the beginning of creation still elude me.
Ignorant animals engage in senseless battles. One should achieve their desires without fighting.
Though I may rule the heavens...I still do not have all I desire. I seek infinite knowledge...
I obtained my ravens through the rite. They surround, peck at, and slaughter those who turn their backs on heaven.
Visit: Tell me all you know. I am certain there is more to you than what I heard from [F].
Level: Hmm... I accept. For there is no knowledge greater than that gained through experience.
This is insufficient to fuel my persistence.
What must I offer to satisfy my desire?
Summon: No soul is so ignorant to not know of the ruler aloft the nine realms. It is I, Alfaðör, the Celestial King.
Learn Skill: I shall transcend the creator, no matter the sacrifice.
Confession:
Towers piercing the heavens, iron carriages traversing vast lands... A world that uses no magic...
Your world has mastered steel and intellect, far from influence of gods and spirits. It is fascinating...
There was once no thing or place I could glean from, having learned everything about the nine realms...
Everything except the writings that depict creation, that is...
It is satisfying to absorb knowledge once inaccessible to me. However, I have not yet reached the creator...
I shall obtain more knowledge and ascend to the highest echelon...
Status: There is no need to give you my name. There is not a single soul who does not know who I am.
*grunt* What is it you seek? Hm?
I seek to know all things about this world.
If there is knowledge to be obtained, any cost is trivial.
The writings that depict the beginning of creation hold secrets within them... Secrets I must discern.
Alfaðör... That is a name worthy of me.
Tell me all about the world from whence you came, then I shall grant you what you desire.
